reviewText:
Though I've watched this movie from a Christian Station I can honestly say: I give this the highest rating possible.
And I would highly recommend this movie even though it seems to be only on VHS and not on DVD.
And I can also recommend the main actress in the lead role; Michelle Trachtenberg to give an admiral role in the story.
Enjoy this movie from Amazon, the only place I've been able to, find it.
We have rented several historical fiction videos but all of us loved this one.  So glad we decided to purchase it.  Highly recommended.
